references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 122-126.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Sierpiński Constant
formula: -Pi*log(Pi)+2*Pi*gamma+4*Pi*log(GAMMA(3/4)).Equals Pi*A241017. - _Eric W. Weisstein_, Dec 10 2014Equals Pi*(A086058-1). - _Eric W. Weisstein_, Dec 10 2014
mathematica: K=-Pi Log[Pi]+2 Pi EulerGamma+4 Pi Log[Gamma[3/4]];First@RealDigits[N[K,105]](* _Ant King_, Mar 02 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) -Pi*log(Pi)+2*Pi*Euler+4*Pi*log(gamma(3/4))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 5080); x=-Pi*log(Pi)+2*Pi*Euler+4*Pi*log(gamma(3/4)); for (n=1, 5000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b062089.txt", n, " ", d)) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009
